pageContext.claim: “But listen, CNN -- the worst. I mean the worst, the worst. Oh, their light just went off, see? What -- the light was on, they just -- they don't like it. You know it's tough. You're fake, CNN. … You know, when that light goes on that means you're live.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump sometimes falsely claims that he can see a camera light indicating that CNN is cutting away from his rally in real time.
